alert.note: Alert for Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:24PM EDT until August 05 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL WICOMICO COUNTY... At 424 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Delmar to near Salisbury to Parsonsburg, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Wicomico County, including the following locations... Melson, Salisbury-Wicomico, Chesapeake Heights and Pittsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
